issue.title: [Python] Add function to set Hadoop CLASSPATH
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1317](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1317). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Getting access to hdfs via libhdfs requires the setting of several environment variables. 
Many of these paths should be auto-detectable requiring less or perhaps even no information from the user. This would lower the access barrier to hdfs for a non-dev user.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1317?focusedCommentId=16111085) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
My understanding is that you can set `CLASSPATH` in `os.environ` prior to JNI bootstrap. A patch would be welcome
